text: Pest Megyei Hírlap ('Pest County News') was a Hungarian newspaper, and was the organ of the Pest County Committee of the Hungarian Socialist Workers Party and the Pest County Council. It was published daily (except Mondays), and first appeared in the 1950s. The last issue was published on 4 February 1995. ==References== Category:Hungarian-language newspapers Category:Defunct newspapers published in Hungary Category:Communist newspapers Category:Communism in Hungary Category:Newspapers published in Budapest
title: Pest Megyei Hírlap
